org.drip.service.stream

Class Serializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActActDCParams, Base, BasketMarketParams, BasketMeasures, BasketProduct, BondCouponMeasures, BondProductBuilder, BondRefDataBuilder, BondRVMeasures, BondWorkoutMeasures, CalibrationParams, CashSettleParams, CDXIdentifier, Component, ComponentMarketParams, ComponentMeasures, ComponentQuote, CouponSetting, CreditCurve, CreditSetting, CurrencyPair, CurrencySet, DateAdjustParams, DateTime, DiscountCurve, EmbeddedOptionSchedule, ExerciseInfo, FactorSchedule, FloaterSetting, FXBasisCurve, FXForward, FXForwardCurve, FXSpot, IdentifierSet, NodeTweakParams, NotionalSetting, Period, PeriodSet, PricerParams, Quote, QuoteConvention, QuotingParams, RatesSetting, TerminationSetting, TreasuryBenchmark, TsyBmkSet, ValuationParams, Weekend, WorkoutInfo

    public abstract class Serializer
extends java.lang.Object
    This interface defines the core object serializer methods – serialization into and de-serialization out of byte arrays, as well as the object version.
